songs.title: You’ve Changed
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Stealing hearts was your pastime
I saw girls falling hook line
You stole kisses and threw them aside
Hits and misses you lost sight

[Chorus]
You've changed, oh
For the better, yeah
You've changed, oh
For the better, yeah

[Verse 2]
Making waves was your hobby, yeah
And I asked you to hold me
And I knew it you do it all over the world
All is different now I'm your girl

[Chorus]
You've changed, oh
For the better, yeah
You've changed, oh
For the better, yeah
You've changed
For the better, oh
You've changed, oh
For the better

[Instrumental]

[Chorus]
You've changed, oh
For the better, yeah
You've changed, oh
For the better, yeah
You've changed
For the better, oh
You've changed, oh
For the better
